alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 8:21PM MST until August 15 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 821 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Papago Park, or near Tempe, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Tempe, Paradise Valley, Laveen, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Arizona Mills Mall, North Mountain Park, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Scottsdale, Arizona State University, Camelback Mountain, and Sky Harbor Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 206. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 11. US Highway 60 between mile markers 159 and 173. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 1 and 8. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 47 and 49. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 141 and 156. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
